title.narrative: OUTPUT 7.2. SUPPLY OF SERVICES / M&E

description.narrative: By end 2021, state actors and civil society have up-to-date descriptive and analytical information (qualitative and quantitative) on vulnerability and the different forms of disparity (socio-economic, gender, geographical), which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Building Capacity For Evaluation, Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Communication And Advocacy, Cross Sectoral - Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Economic And Social Policy General, Evaluation, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Reducing Child Poverty, Research, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: By the end of 2022, the Government makes better use of knowledge about the situation of children, especially the most disadvantaged, in decision-making and implements inclusive development policies and strategies with youth and adolescents' participation

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF continued to support the capacity development of government and civil society partners, and the national statistics system, most notably through development of national and provincial;child poverty profiles, to;ensure the availability of up-to-date analytical information on the SDGs and the situation of children and women in Chad.;UNICEF;launched the process of;evaluating key results for children;to;inform the;formulation;of;the new;CPD. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022
